educator.label: Educator / Teacher
educator.description: Explains concepts, teaches skills, breaks things into steps.
educator.tagline: Turn know-how into clear, actionable lessons.
educator.fullDescription: You thrive at explaining, simplifying, and helping people make real progress. Your content compounds as evergreen value.

entertainer.label: Entertainer / Performer
entertainer.tagline: Capture attention with humor, story, and energy.
entertainer.fullDescription: You shine on camera and love making people feel somethingâ€”laughs, thrills, or surprise. Great fit for trends and rapid iteration.

lifestyle.label: Lifestyle & Inspiration
lifestyle.description: Daily routines, fashion, wellness, motivation, travel.
lifestyle.tagline: Make your habits and taste the brand.
lifestyle.fullDescription: You inspire through routines, aesthetics, and personal stories. Your personality is the productâ€”show, don't tell.

reviewer.label: Reviewer / Analyst
reviewer.description: Unboxings, comparisons, deep dives, opinions with evidence.
reviewer.tagline: Help people decide with honest breakdowns.
reviewer.fullDescription: You love testing, comparing, and forming opinions backed by evidence. Trust is your growth engine.

journey.label: Journey / Documenter

journey.tagline: Bring people along as you learn and build.
journey.fullDescription: You share the real processâ€”wins and stumbles. Authenticity and consistency turn long arcs into loyal communities.

hero.title: Climbley â€” Your Personal AI Producer
hero.subtitle: Stop overthinking. Start building. Finally achieve the consistency that successful creators have.

problem1.title: Does This Sound Familiar?
problem1.text1: You've got ideas. Real ones. You know you should be creating content, building an audience, maybe even growing your business through it. But here's what actually happens: you record one video, feel good about it, then... nothing for three weeks.
problem1.text2: You sit down to create and immediately hit a wall: "What should I even post about?" An hour later, you're still staring at a blank screen. Meanwhile, you're watching creators with half your expertise grow their audiences simply because they show up consistently.
problem1.text3: The frustration is real. And it's not your fault.

problem2.title: Here's the Real Problem
problem2.text: Most people think the hard part of content creation is coming up with ideas or being creative. It's not. The real challenge is organization, planning, and maintaining consistency long enough to see results.

solution.title: Meet Your Personal Producer
solution.text: Think of Climbley as the producer you'd hire if you had a team â€” except it's AI-powered, always available, and fits in your pocket. It builds your content strategy, tracks your progress, and keeps you accountable when motivation fades.

howItWorks.title: Here's How It Works

step1.title: ðŸŽ¯ Discover Your Niche
step1.description: A guided quiz helps you identify where your content fits and who it's really for. No more guessing.

step2.title: ðŸ§  Your Weekly Content Plan
step2.description: Climbley generates a complete content calendar with video prompts, hooks, and post ideas tailored to your platforms. You wake up knowing exactly what to create.

step3.title: ðŸ“ˆ Visual Progress Tracking
step3.description: Watch your growth, engagement, and consistency improve with a clean dashboard that shows you what's working.

step4.title: ðŸ”” Smart Accountability
step4.description: Gentle reminders nudge you when it's time to shoot or post â€” so you never lose momentum.

howItWorks.summary: No more Sunday night panic about Monday's content. No more weeks of silence. Just a clear system that keeps you moving forward.

whyNow.title: Why This Matters Now
whyNow.text1: Your content is your currency in today's world. Whether you're a plumber, a fitness coach, a financial advisor, or running a cleaning company â€” people want to see what you do before they trust you. They want to learn from you, understand your approach, and feel confident you're the right choice.
whyNow.text2: That's how clients find you. That's how opportunities appear. That's how your income grows.
whyNow.text3: Being excellent at your craft isn't enough anymore. You need to show it. Share it. Build an audience around it.

q1.question: Do I need experience creating content?
q1.answer: Not at all. Climbley adapts to your level â€” whether you're posting your first video or your hundredth.

q2.question: What platforms does it support?
q2.answer: Currently YouTube, Instagram, and TikTok, with more platforms coming soon.

q3.question: How much does it cost?
q3.answer: $9.99/month â€” less than a couple of coffees. Cancel anytime, no strings attached.
